wikitext.*:
<noinclude>Only for {{tl|Sprites}}</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgSprites) || !$wgSprites}--><!--{assign var="wgSprites" value=true scope="global"}--><script>
window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function(){
    mw.loader.implement("widgetSprites",function($, jQuery){
        $(function() {
            $('.sprites').each(function() {
                var img = $(this).find('img').removeAttr('width').removeAttr('height');
                if (this.dataset.scalewidth) img.css('width', this.dataset.scalewidth);
                if (this.dataset.link) $(this).css('cursor', 'pointer').on('click', function() {
                    window.open('/' + encodeURIComponent(this.dataset.link), '_blank');
                });
            });
        });
    });
});</script><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
